thread.title: AuctionTime Finishes August Auctions With Over $52 Million In Gross Sales
thread.title_full: AuctionTime Finishes August Auctions With Over $52 Million In Gross Sales - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AuctionTime Finishes August Auctions With Over $52 Million In Gross Sales
text:
AuctionTime.com
LINCOLN, Neb. , Aug. 31, Buyers and sellers around the world participated in AuctionTime.com 's weekly timed auctions to exchange over 4,500 assets over the month of August, grossing over $52 million in sales. A unique online auction platform, AuctionTime connects buyers and sellers around the world to move equipment and assets in the trucking, agriculture, construction, and heavy machinery industries at market values. New auction listings are added constantly, and bidding is easy with free bidding registration, no buyer fees, and no hidden reserves. Bidding opens every Tuesday at 9 a.m. (CDT) , with auctions closing every Wednesday.

About AuctionTime
Powered by Machinery Trader, Truck Paper, TractorHouse, and MarketBook, AuctionTime.com is a product of Sandhills Publishing-an information processing company headquartered in Lincoln, Nebraska . AuctionTime equipment listings appear both online and in print across Sandhills' trade publications and corresponding websites to reach buyers around the world in the trucking, agriculture, construction, and heavy equipment industries.
